title: F/S - T206 Frank Chance (Red Portrait) - PSA 3 Price Reduction
author: Frazier

posts.post_title: F/S - T206 Frank Chance (Red Portrait) - PSA 3 Price Reduction
posts.post_content: Up for sale is a T-206 Frank Chance (Red Portrait) card in PSA 3 VG condition. Tuff HOF card to find and well centered. Piedmont 350 back. See scans for further details. Price is $330 by Paypal F/F to [url]billscheffel@yahoo.com[/url]. I will cover the shipping costs. Thanks for looking and I will answer any/all questions by private message or above e-mail. First I'll take it, trumps all other inquiries.
